thread.title: EastEnders spoilers: Ian gets some bad news about his health and there's trouble ahead for Dot
thread.title_full: EastEnders spoilers: Ian gets some bad news about his health and there's trouble ahead for Dot

author: Claire Murphy
title: EastEnders spoilers: Ian gets some bad news about his health and there's trouble ahead for Dot
text:
Ian goes for a check-up (Photo: BBC) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
We’ve watched Ian Beale grow up on screen and the scrawny teenager is now a middle-aged man – with the ‘dad bod’ to match. 
But his years of fried food at the chippy, bacon sarnies at the caff and not much exercise are catching up with him. He’s called in for a health check with a nurse and she tells him to see his GP because the results are bad news. 
But when his family ask how the appointment went, he pretends he’s fine. 
His weight is starting to make him feel self-conscious, though, and after an embarrassing moment, he tells Jane what the nurse really said. The couple agree to start being healthier together. 
■  Adam Woodyatt, who plays Ian, and his son Sam plan to run the London Marathon in aid of the Air Ambulance Service, which helped Sam after he was badly hurt in a crash. See justgiving.com/fundraising/Adam-Woodyatt Mad about the boy Denise is on edge (Photo: BBC) 
Denise is adamant she’s giving up her baby – well, that’s what she’s telling everyone. 
A social worker visits to discuss how the infant is getting on and how the adoption is progressing, but Kim’s questioning is getting too much. Keegan riles Denise (Photo: BBC) 
When an on-edge Denise sees cheeky Keegan in the Square, the situation gets out of control. Will she snap? Dot’s growing solo Dot at the garden centre (Photo: BBC) 
Spring can’t come quickly enough for Dot, who wants to buy some flower bulbs to cheer up the place. 
Jack says he’ll give her a lift to the garden centre but he has to dash off, leaving Dot alone with little Matthew. 
She’s already looked on the internet to find out where the nurseries are and decides to go under her own steam, with Matthew in tow. Her eyesight’s not what it was so there’s bound to be trouble in store...
